quotes.quote: Deerstalking would be a very fine sport if only the deer had guns.
An army of deer would be more formidable commanded by a lion, than a an army of lions commanded by a stag.
How can a deer tell when a leaf falls silent in the forest? She hears it breathing differently.
An army of lions commanded by a deer will never be an army of lions.
I felt like a deer with a hundred hunters after me.
The fabled musk deer searches the world over for the source of the scent which comes from itself.
Deer are like dogs. Except for Bambi, they're pretty personality-less.
I ask people why they have deer heads on their walls. They always say because it's such a beautiful animal. There you go. I think my mother is attractive, but I have photographs of her.
Everything pales in comparison to deer.
You can learn more about hunting deer with a bow and arrow in a week than a gun hunter will learn in his entire life.
They run like deer, jump like deer and think like deer.
Deer hunting would be fine sport, if only the deer had guns.
A wounded deer leaps the highest.
People think of deer as Bambi, cute and cuddly, but they can be extremely dangerous in certain circumstances.
A deer that knows all the hunting techniques of a lion will never fall prey to a lion!
The man who hunts a deer does not gaze at the mountains.
